contents.item: We reject God when we reject people
Religion should lay more emphasis on our relationship with people
Stop trying to make a living and begin to live
Love is the primary nature of God
God is a God of appreciation
Our fellowship with people brings us closer to the Kingdom
The people around you are the instruments that God will use to help you
You cannot cherish God without loving people
You cannot understand God without understanding people
Always appreciate the good in people
There is no communication with God without communication with God’s people
You get divine blessings when you love and cherish both those who love and hate you
It is only when we meet the needs of the people around us that God meets our needs
The image of God is in every human
Time is the raw material for creation
Our attitude to others dictates God’s attitude to us
The proof of your love for God is seen in your service to men
We are all qualified to fellowship with God no matter our situation or condition
You recognize God when you begin to recognize people
Our fellowship is with God when we have mutual fellowship with one another
When you celebrate a person, you are celebrating the creator of that person
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
You disregard God when you disregard His people
Miracles await you when you begin to serve people
All your solutions are in people, and you can only be free when you love them
We all deserve to have a relationship with God
There is always something to appreciate in people
Our fellowship with God cannot be established when we don’t recognize His people
Celebrate God daily by celebrating His creation
Man is the centrality of God’s purpose on earth
Love is about sharing
You cannot serve God without serving people
You cannot fellowship with God when you disqualify another person from fellowshipping with you
Fellowship and interaction with people opens up God’s heart to us
An effective life is a fulfilled one
To help people is to help God
We all have a piece of God in us
Look for people around you and serve them with love and compassion
The only way to practicalize your love for God is by helping and loving others
God is aware of the hypocrisy in the hearts of men
We only perceive God when we receive people
Our service as believers is in our help and attitude towards others
When we relate with people, we indirectly relate with God
God appreciates ordinary people
Glorifying people is the most noble act
Your relationship with God is tested by your relationship with His people
Everything in existence has a purpose
Our behavior to ordinary people depicts our actual nature
To celebrate man is to celebrate God
We cannot see God unless we respect people
What is done unto people is also being done unto God
When we allow people to come into our environment, God gives us His environment
You love God by showing love to His creations
We get distracted through employment and rarely have time to discover our true selves
There is no interaction without God with interaction with men
Celebrate and appreciate people that cannot reward you
Serve God and get grace to serve people
It’s not about who they are, but about God’s principle
Serving people with love and compassion is the best way to bring them to Christ
God is in your neighbor
All men are equal in God’s presence
Love requires fellowship and relationship with people
The best way to celebrate God is to glorify His creation
To live an effective life, you must understand the essence and secret of life
You cannot reach God until you begin to pay attention to humans
We are only qualified for God’s glory when we glorify people
Service to God is largely unacceptable without service to men
God can only relate effectively with you when you relate with people
Fellowship with human beings opens up to fellowship with God
Life is more than survival
The fastest way to see God is to notice people
Humans are the world’s greatest treasure
The service of God is in people
Love everybody, believers or not
Life is all about purpose
The material of life is made from time
Our service as believers is not complete without fellowship with people
When you love your neighbor, you won’t have problems with embracing them
When you love God for real, you will love His creation
Service to humanity is the key to gaining the Kingdom of God
We glorify God when we appreciate humans
God is connected to people
Serving God is equivalent to serving men
The principle of God is love
The ministry of Christ is based on people
Man is not made for the Sabbath. Rather, the Sabbath is made for man
The ministry of Christ is related to fellowshipping with people
Never see yourself as being superior to others
Always celebrate people for who they are
God will only reveal Himself to you when you begin to regard His people
